data.message: A shame there is no MK, despite a lot of Coca-Cola employee's working there and their families living there? Never mind. :-/

replies.message: Gutted! 😔
That's a bit off!
There isn't one for Northampton either
Yeah, that is odd. You'd think that'd be higher up the list as a thank you of sorts
I see now people are moaning about some of us moaning we've not got a stop. There are A LOT of Coca-Cola employee's and families in and around MK. That is all.
Well annoyed about that :(

Hey Sara, we try to cover as much of the country as possible, but we’re unable to visit every town or city.However, do check out our promotion for a chance to have the Christmas Truck visit your house smile emoticon holidaysarecoming.com/win
Coca-Cola Birmingham...Second City  What's going on?
Wow. How could you not go to MK? A few years ago you went to MK AND Bedford and now neither? What's changed?
It literally wouldn't of hurt you to put one between Gloucester and Leicester so that people don't have to travel so far, we're the "Heart of England" and Birmingham is the second biggest city...
"we try to cover as much of the country as possible" yet the closest you get the to country's 2nd most populated city is over 50 miles away?
Basildon....
Sara Stokes Cawte
Andrew Ronald Mitchell so how come you need another visit so soon when there are 10,000 other towns it hasn't been to?
Northern Ireland???

Hey COKE COLA is a huge industry, so don't growl at some one because you can't get every where , we know that, but let the company sit down and try other options as well. Coke is over the top popular in CANADA and the US
MK is not represented??.... Northern Ireland as a whole isn't even included in any in this tour, my nearest one? Conwy in Wales (y)

Vienna, you had a truck last year. Maybe that's why it's not coming to Birmingham this year? It was there Last year.. There is lots of kids in smaller towns and cities who also would like to have a lifetime opportunity to see the truck. Get the real Christmas spirit and think about others not only about yourself and your town!
Coca-Cola EGG IT, EGG IT, EGG IT, EGG IT....................
Wow we are lucky in Nottingham then the truck came to Tesco top valley in 2011 & this year it is coming to Asda westbridgford :)
* West bridgford*
Disappointed that the coca-cola Lorry will not be visiting Preston this year.  It's not Christmas without it. 😕
truck is coming to where i am
It's a story in our local paper now.

Not near the second biggest City Birmingham. I ain't gonna bother nearest is either Gloucester or Leicester!!! And why is it all round Manchester or Liverpool. Do one Coke well stick to Pepsi and still have the biggest German Market in the country we don't need you Yanks.
